title: Sam Altman Restored to OpenAI Board as Investigation Into His Ouster Concludes
description: The CEO is back on the company Board of Directors along with three new members as an investigation prompts corporate governance changes.

title: Wyoming to recognize DAOs as legal entities under newly passed law
description:
Wyoming has passed a law recognizing blockchain-based decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) as legal entities. The bill — titled the Decentralized Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (DUNA) — was signed by the state’s Governor on March 7 and will be effective starting July 1. The full text of the bill does not explicitly name DAOs. Instead, it […]

The post Wyoming to recognize DAOs as legal entities under newly passed law appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BNB Price Soars to 2-Year High as Binance Starts Recovering Lost Momentum
description: The native token of the BNB Chain, $BNB, has seen its price surge to 2-year high amid a wider cryptocurrency market rally, with leading cryptocurrency exchange Binance losing momentum over the past few months and now seemingly starting to recover. BNB is up over 17.7% over the past week and more than 50% since the […]
